data.text: Sidh ne ruoth adiera mari, yaye Nyasaye,
Obiro ngʼado ne jou bura makare,
Gode biro kelo mwandu ne ji,
Obiro chwako joma odhier manie dier ji
Obiro siko ka wangʼ chiengʼ,
Obiro chalo gi koth machwe e lum mongʼadi maber
E ndalone joma kare biro dhi maber,
Obiro bedo gi loch chakre nam nyaka nam
Ogendini modak e piny ongoro biro kulorene
Ruodhi mag Tarshish kod mag dho nembe man maboyo
Ruodhi duto biro kulorene
Nimar obiro konyo joma ochando maywagore,
Obiro kecho joma ok nyal gi joma ochando
Obiro gologi e dich modigigo kendo e timbe mahundu,
Mad odag amingʼa!
Mad cham bed mangʼeny e piny duto,
Mad nyinge sik nyaka chiengʼ
Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel, mondo oyud opak,
Nyinge man-gi duongʼ mondo opaki nyaka chiengʼ
Ma e giko mag lamo mag Daudi Wuod Jesse.
